New Records: Shakib Al Hasan became the second cricketer to score 6000 T20 runs and take more than 400 wickets in the format
Key Match Events: Asitha Fernando hit the winning runs for Sri Lanka in his T20I debut
Ebadot Hossain removed three Sri Lanka batsmen in his first over in T20Is
Mehidy Hasan Miraz scored 38 runs in his first T20I in four years
Afif Hossain hit 39 off 22 balls for Bangladesh
Taskin Ahmed took two catches and two wickets for Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: Maharoof: I would call Asitha Fernando a warrior
Bangladesh bow out of the Asia Cup, ruing mistakes they made on the field
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kusal Mendis survived four lives while scoring a 37-ball 60
Sri Lanka won the match by 2 wickets with 4 balls remaining
Others: Bangladesh sent out Sabbir Rahman and Mehidy Hasan Miraz as opening pairs for the first time in international cricket
Sri Lanka's openers began slowly, scoring just 13 off the first three overs of the chase before exploding to life
